oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Kentucky Headhunters/Erv Woolsey Interview by Bob Allen Side Two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of The Kentucky Headhunters being interviewed by Bob Allen. The last five minutes of the tape consist of a phone interview with Erv Woolsey.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kentucky Headhunters/Erv Woolsey
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Side Two - (0:00) -- Continuation of the Kentucky Headhunters interview with Bob Allen. (0:57) -- Richard Young describes the creativity of The Kentucky Headhunters in their practice room. (1:27) -- Richard Young mentions that the property is located on his grandparents' farmland. (2:30) -- Richard Young describes the band's different publishing companies. Doug, Greg, & Ricky had a publishing company through BMI named "Three-Headed Music." Richard, Fred, Mitchell Fox have a publishing company on the ASCAP side named Head Cheese. (3:36) -- Bob Allen asks the Kentucky Headhunters about their radio show. (5:10) -- The Kentucky Headhunters held a live radio show once a month on Tuesday or Wednesday night. The radio show existed from 1986-1989. (9:44) -- the Kentucky Headhunters first played a bar named "Mr. C's." (10:36) -- Richard Young describes the Kentucky Headhunters playing a club named Picasso's. (14:21) -- Richard Young speaks about their album "Pickin' On Nashville." (15:58) -- Richard Young speaks about the owner of Exit/In. (18:30) -- Richard Young and The Kentucky Headhunters speak about playing bars like "Texarkana" and smaller clubs. (19:40) -- Richard Young describes playing a gig in Washington, D.C. (21:55) -- The Kentucky Headhunters speak about dealing with success in their personal lives and trying to preserve their privacy. (25:27) -- End of Kentucky Headhunters interview. (25:28) -- Bob Allen phone interview with Erv Woolsey. (26:10) -- Erv Woolsey speaks about travelling with his artists (George Strait). (27:23) -- Erv Woolsey says that his business is located on 18th and Grand Avenue (Nashville, TN). (28:44) -- Erv Woolsey speaks about his parents and where he grew up.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: The Kentucky Headhunters (Musical group); Woolsey, Erv
